name: AirPay
description: "The Airpay platform will feature a multi chain wallet, crypto exchange, stocks trading and a Reloadable Fiat card so users can spend crypto profits on everyday goods and services For the first time ever, users of Binance Smart Chain will be able to utilise BSC tokens to quickly and seamlessly pay for real world goods and services with plans for over 150 Cryptocurrencies and 20+ Fiat, users of the AirPay app will have unprecedented choice over how they pay. This is reward token for long term holders over 1400 holders within hours of launch ..we aim to achieve our road as planned we are ahead of schedule"
